mapper.update: UPDATE orderlist SET order_status = #{order_status} WHERE order_id = #{order_id}
UPDATE orderlist SET summary_status = #{summary_status} WHERE order_id = #{order_id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM orderlist WHERE buildTime >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM orderlist WHERE buildTime >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) AND (order_status ="待评价" OR order_status ="已完成");
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(price), 0) FROM orderlist WHERE buildTime >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) AND (order_status ="待评价" OR order_status ="已完成");
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orderlist (user_id, number, order_money, buildTime) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{number}, #{order_money}, #{buildTime})
INSERT INTO orderdetail (book_id, order_id, detail_number) VALUES (#{book_id}, #{order_id}, #{detail_number})
mapper.select: SELECT od.order_detail_id, od.book_id, od.detail_number, ol.order_id, ol.user_id, ol.order_money, ol.number, ol.order_status, ol.summary_status, ol.buildTime, b.book_name, b.price, b.main_picture FROM orderdetail od JOIN orderlist ol ON od.order_id = ol.order_id JOIN booklist b ON od.book_id = b.book_id WHERE od.order_id = #{order_id}
